mapper.select: SELECT ITEM_CREATOR_UUID as itemCreatorUuid, CREATOR_UUID as creatorUuid, (SELECT AUTHORITY_NAME FROM AT_AUTHORITY WHERE AUTHORITY_UUID = T1.CREATOR_UUID) as creatorName FROM RC_ITEM_CREATOR T1 WHERE ITEM_UUID = #{itemUuid} ORDER BY INSERT_DATE ASC

SELECT ITEM_RELATED_AUTHORITY_UUID as itemRelatedAuthorityUuid, AUTHORITY_UUID as authorityUuid, (SELECT AUTHORITY_NAME FROM AT_AUTHORITY WHERE AUTHORITY_UUID = T1.AUTHORITY_UUID) as authorityName FROM RC_ITEM_RELATED_AUTHORITY T1 WHERE ITEM_UUID = #{itemUuid} ORDER BY INSERT_DATE ASC
